chunk: PCI DSS 4_0_1 Requirement Control 9.4.1.1 Defined Approach Requirements: Offline media backups with cardholder data are stored in a secure location. Customized Approach Objective: Offline backups cannot be accessed by unauthorized personnel. Testing Procedures: Testing Procedure 9.4.1.1.a: Examine documentation to verify that procedures are defined for physically securing offline media backups with cardholder data in a secure location. Testing Procedure 9.4.1.1.b: Examine logs or other documentation and interview responsible personnel at the storage location to verify that offline media backups are stored in a secure location.
requirement: Offline media backups with cardholder data are stored in a secure location.
